title: Borderlands 2 Full Game
description:
This is the actual game just cracked and it doesn't require Steam!

First you are going to need to download the torrent, then mount the ISO when the torrent is done seeding.

Next you're going to have to install the game following the directions.

If you have an antivirus, allow ANY borderlands files that pop during the install or after.

This is not a virus, but it's a crack and you should know how a crack version of things work.

Once it's finished you can enjoy playing a game of Borderlands.

I'm not entirely sure if it is online with this version considering the fact that it is cracked so don't expect to go online.

Also this contains all the DLCs so you don't have to worry about that
